com.perfectoMobile.content

Class ContentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.perfectoMobile.content.ContentManager

  • public class ContentManager
extends Object
    The singleton containing all loaded page data records.

      • getContentValue

        public String getContentValue(String contentKey)
        Gets the content value. This will parse the key to extract the Content Data element and then using the key extension it will get the actual value. The key is formatted using the key name along with wavy brackets indicating the position or language if specified
        Parameters:
        contentKey - the content key
        Returns:
        the content value

      • setMatrixData
